availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Mason County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Jane Downing. Resident of Mason County in 1860. Household owned three enslaved persons in Mason County in 1860. Farmer in Mason County in 1863

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, District 3, p. 207.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, District 3, p. 21A.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Mason County, Sub-district 6, KY, October 1863, p. 39, p. 42 of 175 of microfilm (accessed via Ancestry.com).
Find A Grave, "Robert Downing (1826-1898)," Memorial #140585833, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/140585833 (accessed May 2, 2018).
